description: Расширение OneStack с многоролевым workflow, Telegram-уведомлениями и план-фактом

features.name: Создать таблицу roles
features.description: SQL миграция для справочника ролей (sales, procurement, logistics, customs, quote_controller, spec_controller, finance, top_manager, admin)

features.name: Создать таблицу user_roles
features.description: SQL миграция для связи пользователей с ролями (user_id, organization_id, role_id)

features.name: Создать таблицу brand_assignments
features.description: SQL миграция для назначения брендов менеджерам по закупкам

features.name: Создать таблицу workflow_transitions
features.description: SQL миграция для аудит-лога переходов статусов

features.name: Создать таблицу approvals
features.description: SQL миграция для запросов на согласование

features.name: Создать таблицу specifications
features.description: SQL миграция для данных спецификаций (все поля из spec_controller)

features.name: Создать таблицу plan_fact_categories
features.description: SQL миграция для справочника категорий платежей

features.name: Создать таблицу telegram_users
features.description: SQL миграция для связи Telegram с пользователями

features.name: Расширить таблицу quote_items
features.description: Добавить поля assigned_procurement_user, procurement_status, hs_code, customs_duty, customs_extra

features.name: Заполнить справочник roles
features.notes: Already included in migration 001_create_roles_table.sql

features.name: Заполнить справочник plan_fact_categories
features.description: INSERT категорий: client_payment, supplier_payment, logistics, customs, tax, finance_commission, other

features.name: Настроить RLS для новых таблиц
features.description: Row Level Security политики для всех новых таблиц
features.notes: RLS policies were included in each table's migration file. Created verification migration 015 with helper functions.

features.name: Middleware require_role
features.description: Декоратор/функция для проверки роли на route

features.name: Enum статусов workflow
features.description: Определить все статусы и допустимые переходы

features.name: Матрица переходов статусов
features.description: Кто может перевести из какого статуса в какой

features.name: Валидация перехода статуса
features.description: Проверка что переход разрешён для данной роли и текущего статуса
features.notes: Implemented within transition_quote_status() - can_transition() validates roles and status

features.name: Логирование переходов
features.description: Запись в workflow_transitions при каждом переходе
features.notes: Implemented within transition_quote_status() - Step 5 logs to workflow_transitions table

features.name: Автопереход logistics+customs → sales_review
features.description: Когда оба этапа завершены, автоматический переход

features.name: Назначение исполнителей при переходе
features.description: Автоматическое назначение procurement users по брендам при переходе в pending_procurement

features.name: Список КП с моими брендами
features.description: Фильтрованный список КП где есть позиции с моими брендами

features.name: Форма ввода закупочных данных
features.description: Цена, страна/город, вес, срок производства, условия оплаты поставщику

features.name: Скачивание списка для оценки
features.description: Excel export позиций КП для отправки поставщику

features.name: Список КП на этапе логистики
features.notes: Already implemented in Feature #38 - /logistics page shows quotes filtered by pending_logistics status

features.name: Форма ввода логистики
features.notes: Created /logistics/{quote_id} page with form for logistics costs and delivery time. Data stored in quote_calculation_variables.

features.name: Кнопка завершения логистики
features.notes: Implemented in Feature #40 - form includes 'Завершить логистику' button that calls complete_logistics()

features.name: Страница /customs
features.notes: Created /customs route with customs workspace page. Includes parallel stages status, filtering, role check for customs/admin.

features.name: Список КП на этапе таможни
features.notes: Already implemented in Feature #42 - /customs page shows quotes filtered by pending_customs and pending_logistics status

features.name: Форма ввода таможенных данных
features.description: Коды ТН ВЭД, пошлины, доп. расходы
features.notes: Created /customs/{quote_id} GET page with per-item form for HS codes, duty %, and extra charges. Includes progress tracking and parallel stage status.

features.name: Кнопка завершения таможни
features.notes: Implemented in Feature #44 - form includes 'Завершить таможню' button that calls complete_customs()

features.name: Страница /quote-control
features.notes: Created /quote-control route with stats, status filter, pending/awaiting/approved quote lists. Added quote_controller link to nav bar.

features.name: Список КП на проверке
features.notes: Already implemented in Feature #46 - /quote-control page shows quotes filtered by pending_quote_control status

features.name: Чек-лист проверки КП
features.description: Все пункты проверки Жанны с чекбоксами
features.notes: Created /quote-control/{quote_id} page with full 10-item checklist. Auto-detects approval requirements (RUB currency, <100% prepayment, low markup, LPR reward). Shows color-coded status for each item.

features.name: Форма возврата на доработку
features.notes: Created /quote-control/{quote_id}/return GET route for return form and POST handler. Form requires comment, uses transition_quote_status to move to PENDING_SALES_REVIEW.

features.name: Кнопка отправки на согласование
features.notes: Created /quote-control/{quote_id}/request-approval GET route for form and POST handler. Auto-detects approval reasons, pre-fills comment. Transitions to PENDING_APPROVAL.

features.name: Кнопка одобрения КП
features.notes: Created /quote-control/{quote_id}/approve GET/POST routes. Checks if approval is needed, redirects to request-approval if yes. Direct approval to APPROVED status.

features.name: Создание Telegram-бота
features.description: Регистрация бота в BotFather, получение токена
features.notes: Created services/telegram_service.py with full bot infrastructure: Bot initialization, NotificationType enum, message templates, inline keyboards for approvals, send_message/send_notification/send_approval_request functions, webhook management, callback data parsing. Added python-telegram-bot>=21.0 to requirements.txt. Updated .env.example with TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN and TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_URL variables.

features.name: Webhook endpoint
features.notes: Created POST /api/telegram/webhook route in main.py. Added WebhookResult, parse_telegram_update, process_webhook_update, respond_to_command functions to telegram_service.py. Handles text messages, commands (/start, /status, /help), and callback queries (approve, reject, details). Returns JSON responses, always returns 200 OK to prevent Telegram retries.

features.name: Верификация аккаунта
features.description: Привязка telegram_id к user через код

features.name: Команда /status
features.notes: Implemented /status command with role-based task display. Shows tasks for sales, procurement, logistics, customs, quote_controller, and top_manager roles. Includes user info, role badges, task counts by category, and links to system.

features.name: Отправка уведомления task_assigned
features.notes: Created send_task_assigned_notification() and related functions. Records notifications in DB, sends via Telegram if user has linked account. Added notify_users_of_task_assignment() for multiple users and notify_role_users_of_task() for role-based notifications.

features.name: Отправка уведомления approval_required
features.notes: Created send_approval_required_notification() and send_approval_notification_for_quote() functions. Sends to all top_manager/admin users with inline approve/reject/details buttons. Records notifications in DB.

features.name: Inline-кнопка Согласовать
features.notes: Implemented handle_approve_callback() and send_callback_response() functions. Validates Telegram link, user role (top_manager/admin), quote status (pending_approval), then transitions to approved. Updates original message to show result.

features.name: Inline-кнопка Отклонить
features.notes: Implemented handle_reject_callback() function. Validates Telegram link, user role (top_manager/admin), quote status (pending_approval), then transitions to rejected. Uses default rejection comment for Telegram rejections. Updates original message to show result.

features.name: Уведомление status_changed
features.notes: Implemented status_changed notification functionality: StatusChangedNotification dataclass, send_status_changed_notification() for sending to individual users, notify_quote_creator_of_status_change() for notifying quote creator, and notify_assigned_users_of_status_change() for notifying all assigned users (creator, procurement, logistics, customs). Skips actor from notification (they made the change). Records in DB and sends via Telegram if linked.

features.name: Уведомление returned_for_revision
features.notes: Implemented returned_for_revision notification functionality: ReturnedForRevisionNotification dataclass, send_returned_for_revision_notification() for sending to individual users with Telegram message and DB recording, notify_creator_of_return() convenience function that fetches quote details and notifies creator. Integrated into /quote-control/{quote_id}/return POST handler to send notification on successful return.

features.name: Сервис согласований
features.notes: Created approval_service.py with full CRUD operations: Approval dataclass, create_approval(), create_approvals_for_role(), get_approval(), get_approval_by_quote(), get_approvals_for_quote(), get_pending_approval_for_quote(), get_pending_approvals_for_user(), get_approvals_requested_by(), get_approvals_with_details(), count_pending_approvals(), update_approval_status(), approve_quote_approval(), reject_quote_approval(), cancel_pending_approvals_for_quote(), has_pending_approval(), get_latest_approval_decision(), get_approval_stats_for_user(). Updated services/__init__.py with all exports.

features.name: Создание запроса на согласование
features.notes: Created request_approval() function in approval_service.py with ApprovalRequestResult dataclass. Function performs complete workflow: validates quote status, transitions to pending_approval, creates approval records for top_manager/admin users via create_approvals_for_role(), sends Telegram notifications via send_approval_notification_for_quote(). Updated main.py POST handler at /quote-control/{quote_id}/request-approval to use the new function. Now shows approvals_created and notifications_sent counts on success.

features.name: Обработка решения согласования
features.notes: Created process_approval_decision() function with ApprovalDecisionResult dataclass. Complete workflow: validates approval exists and is pending, validates quote is in pending_approval status, updates approval record, transitions quote to approved/rejected, cancels other pending approvals, sends notifications to creator and requester. Updated services/__init__.py with all exports.

features.name: Страница /spec-control
features.notes: Created /spec-control route with workspace page for spec_controller role. Shows quotes pending specification creation (pending_spec_control status), specifications grouped by status (draft, pending_review, approved, signed). Added 'Спецификации' link to nav_bar for spec_controller/admin roles. Stats cards, status filter, action buttons for each item.

features.name: Список спецификаций на проверке
features.notes: Already implemented in Feature #67 - /spec-control page shows specifications at pending_review status in dedicated section with filtering support.

features.name: Форма ввода данных спецификации
features.notes: Implemented /spec-control/create/{quote_id} for creating new specifications and /spec-control/{spec_id} for viewing/editing. Form includes all 18 fields organized in 5 sections: Identification, Dates/Validity, Currency/Payment, Origin/Shipping, Legal Entities. Supports status transitions: draft → pending_review → approved.

features.name: Preview PDF спецификации
features.notes: Implemented /spec-control/{spec_id}/preview-pdf route. Enhanced specification_export.py with SpecificationData class, fetch_specification_data(), generate_spec_pdf_html(), and generate_spec_pdf_from_spec_id(). Uses all 18 specification fields from the specifications table. Added 'Предпросмотр PDF' button to spec edit page. PDF opens in new tab with inline display.

features.name: Загрузка подписанного скана
features.notes: Implemented /spec-control/{spec_id}/upload-signed POST endpoint. Accepts PDF/JPG/PNG up to 10MB. Stores in Supabase Storage bucket 'specifications'. Updates signed_scan_url field. Added upload UI section to spec edit page (visible when status is approved/signed). Created migration 017 with storage bucket setup instructions.

features.name: Кнопка подтверждения подписи
features.description: Перевод спецификации в статус signed → создание deal
features.notes: Implemented confirm signature button and deal creation. Added 'Подтвердить подпись' button to spec edit page (visible when status=approved + signed_scan exists). Created POST /spec-control/{spec_id}/confirm-signature endpoint. Handler: validates status=approved + has signed_scan, creates deal record with auto-generated deal_number (DEAL-YYYY-NNNN), updates spec status to 'signed', optionally transitions quote to deal_signed. Complete error handling and success feedback.

features.name: Сервис спецификаций
features.notes: Created services/specification_service.py with full CRUD operations: Specification dataclass with all 18 fields, SPEC_STATUSES/SPEC_STATUS_NAMES/SPEC_STATUS_COLORS/SPEC_TRANSITIONS constants, status helpers (get_spec_status_name, get_spec_status_color, can_transition_spec, get_allowed_spec_transitions), create_specification(), get_specification(), get_specification_by_quote(), get_specifications_by_status(), get_all_specifications(), get_specifications_with_details(), count_specifications_by_status(), specification_exists_for_quote(), update_specification(), update_specification_status(), set_signed_scan_url(), delete_specification(), generate_specification_number(), get_specification_stats(), get_specifications_for_signing(), get_recently_signed_specifications(). Updated services/__init__.py with all exports.

features.name: Создание спецификации из КП
features.notes: Created create_specification_from_quote() function in specification_service.py with CreateSpecFromQuoteResult dataclass. Function fetches quote data, optionally uses specific version data, pre-fills 15+ specification fields from quote and calculation variables (proposal_idn, currency, exchange rate, payment terms, countries, legal entities, periods). Returns result with success flag, specification object, error message, and prefilled_fields dict. Updated services/__init__.py with exports.

features.name: Сервис сделок
features.notes: Created services/deal_service.py with full CRUD operations: Deal dataclass with all fields (id, specification_id, quote_id, organization_id, deal_number, signed_at, total_amount, currency, status, created_by, created_at, updated_at), DEAL_STATUSES/DEAL_STATUS_NAMES/DEAL_STATUS_COLORS/DEAL_TRANSITIONS constants, status helpers (get_deal_status_name, get_deal_status_color, can_transition_deal, get_allowed_deal_transitions, is_deal_terminal), create_deal(), get_deal(), get_deal_by_specification(), get_deal_by_quote(), get_deals_by_status(), get_all_deals(), get_deals_with_details(), count_deals_by_status(), deal_exists_for_specification(), deal_exists_for_quote(), update_deal(), update_deal_status(), complete_deal(), cancel_deal(), update_deal_amount(), delete_deal(), generate_deal_number(), get_deal_stats(), get_active_deals(), get_recent_deals(), get_deals_by_date_range(), search_deals(). Updated services/__init__.py with all exports.

features.name: Создание сделки из спецификации
features.notes: Created create_deal_from_specification() function in deal_service.py with CreateDealFromSpecResult dataclass. Function fetches specification with quote/customer details, validates spec status (approved/signed) and signed_scan, extracts financial data (total_amount, currency), generates deal_number, creates deal record in 'active' status, optionally updates spec status to 'signed'. Returns result with success flag, Deal object, error message, specification_updated flag, and extracted_data dict. Updated services/__init__.py with all exports.

features.name: Страница /finance
features.notes: Created /finance route for finance role workspace. Shows deal statistics (active, completed, total amounts), filterable deals list with status badges. Navigation link added for finance/admin roles. Includes specs/quote/customer join, formatted amounts with currency.

features.name: Список активных сделок
features.notes: Already implemented in Feature #77 - /finance page shows active deals list by default with status filter, includes deal_number, spec_number, customer, amount, signed_at date, status badge and 'Подробнее' action button.

features.name: Таблица план-факт по сделке
features.notes: Created /finance/{deal_id} route with comprehensive deal detail page. Shows deal info (number, customer, spec, amounts, dates), plan-fact summary (planned/actual income/expense, margin, variance), and plan-fact table with all payment items. Table shows category, description, planned/actual dates and amounts, variance with color coding, payment status (paid/pending), and edit button for unpaid items.

features.name: Форма регистрации платежа
features.notes: Created payment registration form at /finance/{deal_id}/plan-fact/{item_id}. GET shows form with planned data card (category, amount, date, status) and actual data form (amount, currency, exchange rate, date, payment document, notes). POST validates and updates plan_fact_items with actual payment data. Database trigger automatically calculates variance. Full validation for role (finance/admin), organization access, and data integrity.

features.name: Сервис план-факта
features.notes: Created services/plan_fact_service.py with full CRUD operations: PlanFactCategory and PlanFactItem dataclasses, category functions (get_all_categories, get_category, get_category_by_code, get_income_categories, get_expense_categories), create operations (create_plan_fact_item, create_plan_fact_item_with_category_code, bulk_create_plan_fact_items), read operations (get_plan_fact_item, get_plan_fact_items_for_deal, get_plan_fact_items_by_category, get_unpaid_items_for_deal, get_paid_items_for_deal, get_overdue_items_for_deal, count_items_for_deal), update operations (update_plan_fact_item, record_actual_payment, clear_actual_payment, update_planned_payment), delete operations (delete_plan_fact_item, delete_all_items_for_deal), summary and statistics (get_deal_plan_fact_summary, get_items_grouped_by_category, get_upcoming_payments, get_payments_for_period), validation (validate_item_for_payment, validate_deal_plan_fact). Updated services/__init__.py with all exports.

features.name: Автогенерация плановых платежей
features.notes: Created generate_plan_fact_from_deal(), regenerate_plan_fact_for_deal(), get_plan_fact_generation_preview() functions. Added GeneratePlanFactResult dataclass. Created UI routes: GET/POST /finance/{deal_id}/generate-plan-fact for preview and execution. Updated deal detail page with auto-generation buttons. Generates payments for: client_payment (advance + final), supplier_payment (advance + final), logistics, customs, finance_commission based on quote calculation variables.

Already implemented in migration 009: database trigger 'calculate_plan_fact_variance()' automatically computes variance_amount = actual - planned (or with exchange rate conversion for foreign currencies). UI in /finance/{deal_id} displays variance per item with color coding (red for overspend, green for savings) and total variance in summary.

features.name: /admin/users
features.notes: Created /admin/users page for admin-only user management. Shows all org members with roles, Telegram status, join date. Added /admin/users/{user_id}/roles GET/POST for role assignment with checkboxes. Color-coded role badges, stats cards (users, Telegram, roles count), role legend. Added '' nav link for admin users.

features.name: Страница /admin/brands
features.notes: Created /admin/brands page for brand assignment management. Features: GET /admin/brands (list all assignments + unassigned brands from quotes), GET/POST /admin/brands/new (create assignment with brand name + procurement manager dropdown), GET/POST /admin/brands/{id}/edit (change assigned manager), POST /admin/brands/{id}/delete (remove assignment). Stats cards show: assigned brands, unassigned brands, procurement managers, total brands in quotes. Imports brands from quote_items. Admin-only access.

features.name: Обновить dashboard для ролей
features.description: Показывать задачи в зависимости от роли

features.name: Просмотр истории переходов
features.description: UI для просмотра workflow_transitions по КП
